Description: MCBRIDE MUSIC & PAWN 2010 GIBSON LES PAUL JUNIOR (HUMBUCKER), VINTAGE SUNBURST Description: 2010 GIBSON LES PAUL JUNIOR (HUMBUCKER), VINTAGE SUNBURST, VERY GOOD CONDITION. SOME REGULAR PLAYWEAR THROUGHOUT, A FEW SMALL DINGS TO SIDES OF BODY, ONE SLIGHT SCRATCH TO BACK OF NECK (HARD TO FEEL WHILE PLAYING), ONE SMALL DING TO FINGERBOARD BETWEEN 5-6TH FRETS, VOLUME POT MISSING CENTER INLAY. PLAYS AND SOUNDS FANTASTIC, A KILLER LIMITED EDITION LP JR, FEATURING AN UNKNOWN PAT NO 2737842 HUMBUCKER (WITH COIL TAP VIA THE PUSH-PUSH TONE KNOB), A SLIM 60'S STYLE NECK PROFILE, DOT INLAYS, AND A GREAT SUNBURST FINISH. APPROX 7.5 LBS. THIS GUITAR IS ASSUREDLY READY TO ROCK AND ROLL. LXX/IXX Notes: McBride Music and Pawn is dedicated to giving great deals and providing excellent customer service. With our 30 day return policy you can feel confident in your purchase! If you are not satisfied for any reason send us the item back and we will send your money back.
